title: Reckoning of the Sage
goal: A major battle ensues, Kaelen unleashes his full, restored power, working in concert with his allies.

beats.summary: A climactic battle erupts against the Blight's most formidable manifestations, testing the limits of the party's combined strength.
Kaelen, having fully recovered his memories and powers, unleashes ancient magic, coordinating with Elara's knowledge, Valerius's strength, and Lyra's cunning.
The battle is costly, with moments of despair, but the combined efforts of the guardians begin to push back the Blight's forces.
